page.title: 15*Agricultural contracting***
page.content:
My dad is an agricultural contractor. He has got a contract with Burrough Court cutting hedges. A contract with the owner of the local stud where my dad dics the gallops. The gallops are four metres wide and a mile and a half round. We have to stone pick which means that we collect all the loose stones and they are used for hard core. If we didn't pick them up the horses would damage their hooves. Dad also does ploughing hay making wood sawing, tree felling and lopping. He also uses diggers to make ornamental ponds and does fencing. He also uses a drott which is a tractor with tracks and a loader.
written by John Riley aged 11 years.
